page.title: 12Jayne Allens Weekend.
page.content: My name is Jayne Allen and it was 9.00am. on a typical Saturday morning,as I reluctantly climbed out of bed I heard my Mum shout me for breakfast.I didn't exactly want any breakfast but it wasn't entirely up to me,so I got changed and went down. I had my breakfast that consisted of cereal and toast,I finished by 9.30am. I had just got upstairs when my Mum reminded me we had to go to West Heath for the weeks shopping.So I grabbed my jacket and purse and went back downstairs.I climbed into my Mums Fiat Panda (I was happy because I had got out of the washing up).We drove to the shops and did all the shopping,which took quite a while.We finally arrived home again (loaded up)at about 12.30pm We unpacked about five carrier-bags while Dad made us all some lunch and did some other jobs as well.
